feed.title: Professional Fellows Program for Economic Empowerment

entry.title: PFP Documentation Week 1-3
entry.summary: Introduction: The Professional Fellows Program is a fast paced internship, where fellows develop new skills and resources to help them empower their work back on their home countries. Data: Scrapping for relevant data to base the action plan is the first step for the program…
entry.content:
Introduction:

The Professional Fellows Program is a fast paced internship, where fellows develop new skills and resources to help them empower their work back on their home countries.

Data:

Scrapping for relevant data to base the action plan is the first step for the program deliverables writing.

Keywords:

Anchor organisations.
Irregular immigration.
Mini grant.
Action plan.
Data collection.

Location:

Chiapas, State in Southern Mexico.
Tuxtla Gutierrez, the state capital.
Ocosingo, one of the decentralised education cities.
San Cristobal de las Casas, the cultural capital, place of divergent

Stakeholders:

Chiapas State Agriculture Office

Suggestions:
Action plan focus on diagnostic part.
Data analysis.
Content development.

Run surveys:
For industry,
Students
NGOs
